name: Superhero Movie
description:
You are a superhero faster than wind, faster than economic inflation, faster than a dynamite explosion suspiciously aproaching elder innocent people.

One ordinary afternoon you leave the cinema and discover that the city is in danger, so your duty is to protect the citizens using your super speed.

Tutorial

  • Controller: 
    • Move: Left joystick
    • Carry or drop citizens: A
    • Restart level: Start / Y
  • Keyboard and mouse:
    • Move: WASD / Arrows
    • Carry or drop citizens: E / Spacebar / Click
    • Restart level: R
